name: 阿诺德·德洛德
name_full: 阿诺德·德洛德 Arnaud Delord

last_movies.title: 英雄联盟：双城之战 第二季
英雄联盟：双城之战 第一季

introduction: Arnaud DELORD, Co-Founder, Fortiche Production & Co-Director of ArcaneArnaud Delord is Co-Founder of Fortiche Production, the internationally renowned animation studio behind the critically-acclaimed series Arcane - for which he is also Co-Director.He studied at the "Ecole Nationale Supérieure des Arts Décoratifs" of Paris (ENSAD) in 2002 and began his career as a director in the world of music videos - including Deus, Tahiti Boy, Mellow, Stuck In The Sound and BB Brunes - where he developed concepts that mixed live action and animation techniques. He launched Fortiche Production in 2009 together with Pascal Charrue and Jérôme Combe.
